headline: RTX Defense Wins Link Future Tech Pipeline With Current Valuation Picture
summary: RTX (NYSE:RTX) secured a DARPA contract for advanced X-ray situational awareness tools under the XENA program. The company's BBN Technologies unit will work on long range imaging systems aimed at providing battlefield intelligence to U.S. commanders. RTX’s Raytheon ELCAN business won a contract to supply customized optical sights to the German Armed Forces. The optics contract positions RTX within ongoing NATO force modernization and broadens its presence in European defense markets. For...
